summary: A comprehensive model class that encapsulates the end‑to‑end workflow for training, validating, testing and deploying a text classification system. It prepares data loaders from configuration, defines the forward computation, constructs the loss function, and orchestrates the training, validation and test steps while supporting inference on new texts.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use solution for automatically assigning categories or labels to textual inputs, enabling use cases such as sentiment analysis, topic tagging, spam detection, or any custom text categorization required by business applications.
